name: Desertopia (itch)
description:
Make your way across the desert in search of Desertopia! Be careful, the sun is hot, and the people in the desert are known for being misleading. This was a game created for the BenBonk Game Jam #1.

Controls:
WASD to move
E for action/exit dialog
Shift + Esc to go to game menu

Enter (in menu) to start game
Esc (in menu) to exit game
